text: Dmitri Nikolayevich Varfolomeyev (; born 15 March 1978 in Leningrad) is a former Russian football player. He is a younger brother of Sergei Varfolomeyev. ==Honours== ;Zhenis Astana *Kazakhstan Premier League champion: 2001 *Kazakhstan Cup winner: 2001 ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Footballers from Saint Petersburg Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Saturn Ramenskoye players Category:FC Dynamo Saint Petersburg players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Kazakhstan Category:FC Vityaz Podolsk players Category:FC Zhenis Astana players Category:FC Kristall Smolensk players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Dmitri Varfolomeyev (footballer, born 1978)
